import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-intro', templateUrl: './intro.component.html', styleUrls: ['./intro.component.scss'] }) export class IntroComponent { }

Hi, my name is

Uyen Tran.

I build things for the web.

I'm a software engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I'm focused on building accessible, human-centered products at Macquarie Bank .
